/policies/terms-and-conditions.title: Terms & Conditions - GeniAI- Mobile App Template
/policies/terms-and-conditions.description: Geni AI App Template is a premium Framer template crafted for AI and productivity-focused apps. With its modern design, intuitive layout, and seamless customization, it empowers you to create a stunning website effortlessly.
p: By using our services, you agree to abide by these rules and guidelines, which outline your rights.

Welcome to Geni AI ! These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website, products, and services. By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use our Services.

By using our website and Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our Services.
You agree to use our Services only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws. You are prohibited from:
- Using our Services to engage in any unlawful or fraudulent activities.
- Disrupting or interfering with the security, performance, or accessibility of our website or Services.
- Using automated systems or software to extract data from our website for commercial purposes.

All content on our website, including text, images, graphics, logos, and designs, is the intellectual property of Geni AI or our licensors, and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or use any of our content without our express written permission.
When you place an order for our design services, you agree to the following terms:
- Pricing: All prices are listed in Dollars and are subject to change without notice. Prices may vary depending on the scope of the project.
- Payment Terms: Payment for services must be made in accordance with the agreed terms. Late payments may incur additional charges.
- Refunds: Refunds will only be issued in accordance with our refund policy, which will be discussed prior to project commencement.

We strive to meet the deadlines for all projects; however, delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances. We will communicate any changes to the project timeline as soon as possible. We are not liable for any delays caused by client-related issues, including lack of timely communication or incomplete information.
- Providing accurate and complete information necessary for the completion of design projects.
- Responding to requests for feedback and approvals in a timely manner.
- Ensuring that any content provided to Geni AI for the project does not infringe on the intellectual property rights of third parties.

We offer a set number of revisions for each project, as outlined in your agreement. Any additional revisions beyond this limit may incur additional charges. Requests for revisions must be made within the time frame agreed upon at the start of the project.

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Geni AI and its affiliates, employees, and agents will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use of our Services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Our total liability to you for any claims arising from your use of our Services is limited to the amount paid by you for the Services.

Our Services are provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee that the Services will meet your requirements, be uninterrupted, error-free, or free from defects. We disclaim any and all warranties, including those of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our Services at any time, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to our business. Upon termination, all rights granted to you under these Terms will cease, and you must immediately cease all use of our Services.

These Terms and your use of our Services are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws, without regard to its conflict of laws principles. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or related to these Terms will be brought exclusively in the courts.

We may update these Terms from time to time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our Services after the changes have been posted will constitute your acceptance of the new Terms.

/policies/privacy-and-policy.title: Privacy Policy - GeniAI- Mobile App Template
/policies/privacy-and-policy.description: Geni AI App Template is a premium Framer template crafted for AI and productivity-focused apps. With its modern design, intuitive layout, and seamless customization, it empowers you to create a stunning website effortlessly.
p: We value your privacy and are committed to transparently explaining how we use, and protect your information.

At Geni AI, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you visit our website, use our services, or otherwise interact with us.
We may collect the following types of information:
- Personal Information: Includes name, email address, phone number, and any other personal data you provide when you sign up for our services, request a quote, or communicate with us.
- Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our website, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the time and date of your visit.
- Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We may use cookies or similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and gather statistical information about website usage.
We use the information we collect for purposes such as:
- Providing, operating, and improving our design services.
- Communicating with you, responding to inquiries, and sending you updates or promotional materials.
- Analyzing website usage and improving the functionality of our website.
- Complying with legal obligations and enforcing our terms and conditions.
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except under the following circumstances:

- Service Providers: We may share information with trusted third-party vendors who help us operate our business, such as payment processors, hosting services, or email platforms, under strict confidentiality agreements.
- Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid legal processes, such as a court order.
- Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or part of our business, your information may be transferred to the new owner.

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
- Access and request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
- Correct or update your personal data.
- Request the deletion of your personal data under certain conditions.
- Object to or restrict the processing of your personal data.

Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit.

Our services are not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it promptly.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Any updates will be posted on this page with the effective date indicated.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.This Privacy Policy was last updated on [08/07/2025].

h2: Start Your Geni AI Journey Today
p: Select from our variety of Plans intended to enhance and streamline your everyday life effectively
Vital functions for beginners who have embarked on AI education
For the savvy user seeking to streamline their daily tasks and job
For the adept user to handle personal plus work-related life chores
Explore each powerful feature of Geni AI in detail, designed to enhance your workflow.
Powered by the latest AI model
From setup steps to feature details, our FAQs cover everything you need to know.
What is Geni AI, and how can it help me?

Geni AI is an innovative AI-powered tool designed to enhance productivity and creativity. It helps users write professional emails, engaging blogs, and unique content in seconds. Beyond writing, Geni AI can generate stunning images and create custom bots tailored to your specific needs, such as grammar correction, travel planning, or automated workflows.
How does Geni AI generate content or images?

Geni AI leverages the advanced capabilities of OpenAI‚Äôs state-of-the-art models. By analyzing the input or prompts you provide, Geni AI generates high-quality outputs, whether it‚Äôs written content, visually stunning images, or functional bots.
Can I integrate Geni AI with third-party apps? How does it work?

Yes, Geni AI offers seamless integration with popular tools like Google Calendar, Slack, and other third-party apps. For example, you can sync Geni AI with Google Calendar to automate meeting scheduling or connect it with Slack to send instant responses and updates.
Is my data safe and secure when using Geni AI?

Absolutely. Geni AI prioritizes user privacy and security. Your data is encrypted using industry-standard protocols, ensuring it‚Äôs protected from unauthorized access. We do not share your information with third parties, and all user interactions are processed securely to maintain confidentiality.
Do I need technical skills to use Geni AI effectively?

Not at all! Geni AI is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly, making it accessible for everyone, regardless of technical expertise. The interface is straightforward, and features like writing, image generation, and bot creation come with simple prompts and guides.
Available on iOS and Android for seamless access anytime, anywhere.

/changelog.title: GeniAI- Mobile App Template
/changelog.description: Geni AI App Template is a premium Framer template crafted for AI and productivity-focused apps. With its modern design, intuitive layout, and seamless customization, it empowers you to create a stunning website effortlessly.
p: Stay up to date with the latest improvements, new features, and performance boosts added to Geni AI.
A refreshed workspace experience with ready-to-use templates for faster content flow.
New layout for faster navigation and focus
Browse & use pre-built templates for blogs, bios, and emails
Pin favorite tools and shortcuts to sidebar
A11Y: Sidebar now fully navigable with keyboard
Template Library LaunchQuickly start with high-converting templates for blogs, product descriptions, landing pages, and email campaigns. Each one is optimized for SEO and tone.
Smarter Workspace NavigationA redesigned left panel makes it easier to jump between tools, saved work, and integrations. Recently opened projects are now listed at the top.
Custom Shortcuts & PinsPin your most-used tools like Image Generator, Grammar Fix, or Blog Writer to the sidebar for one-click access. Fully customizable per user.
Smarter visuals and improved SEO tools help streamline your content workflow.
Image prompts now generate high-res assets with better style control
SEO Assistant suggests meta tags and optimized headlines
Content blocks now support structured data hints
A11Y: Image tool now fully keyboard accessible

Generate Smart VisualsUse natural prompts to create unique images directly inside your editor. Geni AI‚Äôs new visual tool offers multiple styles and resolutions‚Äîperfect for blog posts or landing pages. You can also replace placeholders with branded visuals on the fly.

Better SEO, FasterNew tools auto-suggest meta titles, descriptions, and headings based on your content type. Whether you're writing a blog or product page, your content gets structured right for ranking.
Optimized OutputGenerated content now includes cleaner code and better hierarchy. Exported pages are lighter, scan faster, and are easier to index.
Share content and collaborate across platforms in just one click.
Share blocks directly to Slack channels
Auto-save documents and media to Google Drive
Set default folders for content types
A11Y: Improved focus states in integration panel
Send to Slack InstantlyNow you can send content straight from Geni AI to your team Slack channels. Perfect for approvals, reviews, or updates‚Äîwithout leaving your project view.
Seamless Google Drive SyncSave every output‚Äîdocs, images, or content blocks‚Äîto the right folder. Set folder rules for blogs, client work, or assets, and Geni AI handles the rest.
Smooth WorkflowTeammates with access can now edit or comment via shared links, all while preserving version control inside your workspace.
Geni AI now speaks your language‚Äîwith cleaner, sharper grammar fixes.
Now supports French, Spanish, and German
Grammar assistant improves clarity and tone
A11Y: Language switcher includes screen reader support
Language ExpansionWrite confidently in more languages. Whether you're translating, localizing, or writing from scratch, Geni AI generates and edits in French, Spanish, and German‚Äîflawlessly.
Smarter Grammar EngineClarity, tone, and fluency are now analyzed together. Whether your copy is too formal or not structured well, Geni AI offers cleaner suggestions.
Per-Project SettingsSet a preferred language once‚ÄîGeni AI will adapt tone, structure, and spellcheck rules accordingly.
Our official launch brings core creation, editing, and automation tools.
Smart content blocks for websites and social media
Supports Slack, Notion, and Google Calendar
A11Y: Initial keyboard navigation fully supported
First Step to Smarter WorkWrite blogs, product pages, or newsletters with just a prompt. Geni AI builds layout, structure, and tone in seconds‚Äîready to publish or refine.
Integrated from the StartCalendar scheduling, task notes, and Slack content are all live from Day 1. You can automate updates or send project summaries to collaborators.
Clean Design, Fast OutputThe editor is minimal yet powerful. Cards, AI options, and exports are just one click away for an effortless creative experience.
